en.name: Mat铆as D铆az Arriaza
en.description: Computer Engineer - Sr Analyst - Data Scientist - Developer
en.about-content: In my professional career as a Computer Engineer, I value the opportunity to grow and apply what I have learned in each project I undertake. Working in the banking sector, I pay special attention to the execution of projects, introducing practical proposals and ensuring that they provide real value and improve our way of operating. I prioritize collaboration and open communication, with the commitment to contribute to a work environment where we can all move forward together. Personally, my passion for coffee fuels my dream of one day opening a caf茅 in southern Chile, creating a corner full of warmth and flavor.

en.achievement-1: I led the improvement of a critical client relationship process that faced a high incidence rate. Through the implementation of strategic solutions, I successfully reduced incidents to zero, enhancing both the efficiency and effectiveness of contact selection. This allowed for timely calls that aligned with the bank's pillars of excellence.
en.achievement-2: I redefined a lead delivery process that was limiting sales potential by excluding highly convertible opportunities. After a detailed analysis and the implementation of new definitions, the improved process resulted in a 20% increase in sales, along with a significant reduction in operational issues.
en.achievement-3-title: Development of Technological Solutions and Automation with Python
en.achievement-3: I designed and implemented web solutions, automated Python scripts, and web scraping tools that provided valuable insights for business strategies. These solutions optimized internal processes and significantly reduced man-hours spent on repetitive tasks, allowing teams to focus on higher-value strategic activities and improving efficiency in the measurement and tracking of key performance indicators.
en.achievement-4: I developed advanced dashboards for monitoring critical processes within the department, enabling the anticipation and prevention of issues before they escalated into major problems. These solutions not only improved the visibility of key metrics but also provided a proactive response capability to mitigate potential risks.
